main event: On November 8, 1966, multiple witnesses in San Pedro, California observed a large, circular object with lights around its periphery, which hovered for a few minutes before disappearing upward.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of 500 meters across., Witnesses reported that the object made no sound and appeared to be under intelligent control., The sighting lasted for approximately 5-10 minutes., Witnesses were watching a meteor shower at the time of the sighting., The object exhibited sharp movements and changes in direction swiftly, unlike any known aircraft.
sighted object: large circular object with lights around the periphery
witness description: The witnesses were outdoor observers, including a former Air Force pilot who emphasized the object's advanced maneuverability.
